wordpressPost.title: OZONE!
wordpressPost.content:
Checkmate… Hey, you know how I’m, like, always trying to save the planet? Here’s my chance. Did he just throw my cat out of the window? They’re using our own satellites against us. And the clock is ticking. Hey, you know how I’m, like, always trying to save the planet? Here’s my chance.

We gotta burn the rain forest, dump toxic waste, pollute the air, and rip up the OZONE! ‘Cause maybe if we screw up this planet enough, they won’t want it anymore! God creates dinosaurs. God destroys dinosaurs. God creates Man. Man destroys God. Man creates Dinosaurs.

You really think you can fly that thing? I gave it a cold? I gave it a virus. A computer virus. We gotta burn the rain forest, dump toxic waste, pollute the air, and rip up the OZONE! ‘Cause maybe if we screw up this planet enough, they won’t want it anymore!
